instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 400 F
  2. Cut potatoes into chunks
  3. Mince garlic
  4. Mince parsley
  5. Put potatoes in bowl with olive oil, garlic, salt and pepper
  6. Toss potatoes
  7. Line a sheet pan with foil and spray with cooking spray
  8. Put potatoes on sheet pan and spread out
  9. Roast for 45 min to an hour
  10. Remove and toss with parsley
Source: http://www.foodnetwork.com/recipes/ina-garten/garlic-roasted-potatoes-recipe.html
